data.title: Garmi director Tigmanshu Dhulia partners with Goldfish producer Amit Saxena for his next
data.meta_description: As part of the deal, three new films/series will be created that will appeal to a global audience
data.text:
Buoyed by the positive response for his new political thriller series Garmi, actor-director Tigmanshu Dhulia is now getting ready for his upcoming projects. Next, the National Award-winning filmmaker will be joining hands with Amit Saxena - who has produced the Pushan Kripalani-directed film Goldfish, starring Kalki Koechlin, Deepti Naval, Rajit Kapoor. As many as three films/series are expected to come out of the new collaboration between Splendid Films and Tigmanshu Dhulia Productions LLP.

Also read: Exclusive! Garmi actor Vyom Yadav: Tigmanshu Dhulia is a walking talking institution when it comes to cinema

Speaking about the new collaboration with Amit, Tigmanshu says, “I look forward to partnering with Amit and Splendid Films. Together, we want to create content that is entertaining and appeals to a global audience across geographies.”

A National School of Drama graduate, Tigmanshu has helmed critically acclaimed movies and series like Paan Singh Tomar, Sahib Biwi Aur Gangster, The Great Indian Murder and Haasil, while his performance in Gangs of Wasseypur also garnered a lot of attention. Did you know, Tigmanshu was the casting director for Bandit Queen and he also wrote the dialogues for Dil Se..?

Also read: Exclusive! Tigmanshu Dhulia on making Garmi: I wanted to revisit my first film, Haasil

Streaming on Sony LIV, Garmi follows the journey of a civil service aspirant, named Arvind Shukla, who gets engulfed in college politics, powerplay and crime while pursuing his goals. The nine-episode series has an ensemble cast - featuring Vyom Yadav, Puneet Singh, Veeneet Kumar, Jatin Goswami, Pankaj Saraswat, Anushka Sharma, Ashish Virendra Chowdhary, Jatin Sarin ,Deepraj Rana, Mukesh Tiwari and Disha Thakur in pivotal roles.

Also read: Exclusive! Tigmanshu Dhulia: Kangana Ranaut will remain one of the finest actresses as her work is brilliant

Meanwhile, the story of Splendid Films’ maiden project Goldfish is set in London, and it deals with memory and identity. The movie had its World Premiere at the 2023 Busan International Film Festival. Goldfish is scheduled to hit the theatres in July this year.
